snippet: A new ad from Rick Santorum highlights a theme of his presidential campaign: voting for Mitt Romney is like voting for President Obama.
abstract: A new ad from Rick Santorum highlights a theme of his presidential campaign: voting for Mitt Romney is like voting for President Obama.

headline.main: Santorum Ad Draws Pointed Obama-Romney Parallels
headline.print_headline: Ad Watch: Santorum Keeps Heat on Romney
